resources.string: Enabled, applications can receive and register push services
Disabled, apps can\'t receive push messages or sign up for them

This is an open source project that allows any ROM to enjoy Xiaomi system-level push. For more details, please click to visit the project homepage：MiPushFramework.\nEveryone is welcome to participate. Please make sure to conform to the open source agreement.\nPowered by @Trumeet
This is an open source project that allows any ROM to enjoy Xiaomi system-level push. For more details, please click to visit the project homepage：MiPushFramework
We are automatically checking if the push service is working properly. It takes up to twenty seconds.
Success! The service is running. You should not need to perform any special operation.

Some problems occurred during the inspection: The service is not running. Maybe some of the tools or settings on your device have prevented it from starting. We will try to remove these restrictions in the next step.

If your device is equipped with optimization tools such as greenify or domain blockers,
please add this application to the whitelist.
If you use green guard functions, please disable it for
XMPushServiceas it will stop the Mi Push Service from launching.
If your ROM is a chinese ROM (such as Flyme, EMUI, Magic),
please go to the function management settings such as background management. Add this app to the whitelist.

More questions?
Please open a new issue：Open GitHub repository

When you enable battery optimization for the push service, you will not be able to use it properly. Please click on the button below to request removal of the optimization (some ROMs do not have this setting. If there is no response after clicking, just click Next below.)
You have disabled background running permission for the push service, it will not be able to push in background, you %1$s, then click Next.
need to use Root to enable it (we will handle it automatically)
need to open the App Ops tool and grant Run in background or be awake permissions
Please grant Run in background or be awake permissions
You need to grant "Usage" permission or you will not be able to receive notifications.
Modify Build.prop to disguise as MIUI

Some applications will use their own logic to determine whether the OS running on the device is MIUI. On success, Mi Push will be enabled, otherwise they will use other push methods running in the background. This decision logic is usually parsing build.prop. We try to disguise as MIUI by inserting some key-value pairs into build.prop.

If you want to fake MIUI, please install Magisk, from XDA. After the installation is complete, open Magisk Manager, download MiPushFake. After activation of the module and a restart, your device disguises as MIUI.
You have already enabled this setting. To remove, go to Magisk Manager and uninstall or deactivate the MiPushFake module.
All done! You can start using the service

Some applications will use their own logic to determine whether the OS running on the device is MIUI. On success, Mi Push will be enabled, otherwise they will use other push methods running in the background. This decision logic is usually parsing build.prop. We try to disguise as MIUI by inserting some key-value pairs into build.prop.
Automatically check if the push service is running
In Android 6.0 and later, battery optimization affects push
Tap to share log, submit an issue when needed

Many ROMs (such as OnePlus) have their own background cleanup logic, but they can have whitelists. After clicking, find the app in the opened settings and allow it to run in background. [Note] You need to click here to open the keep-alive interface after each restart of the mobile phone.
Please download the latest version from the Release page. (-> "manager.apk")
Unable to connect to the push service. If you are using a Wakeup Interception Tool or ROM with wakeup restrictions, please add %1$s to the whitelist and try again.
The push service is not compatible to your current version: %1$s. Please click here to upgrade and try again.
You need to install a separate push service that runs in the background. Please click here to install and try again.
Sorry, we currently do not support MIUI.
Your device supports system mode, which will work better. You can get it by tapping Platform APK. (If your device does not support this mode, it will not be installed.)
Your device supports system mode. You should check for updates and download xmsf_service_platform.apk for better operation.
SOmetimes a system upgrades removes permissions. Please re-install the "manager APP" again but do not clear the user data. To get the current version of the installation package Click here
Control the details of the application\'s notification sounds, important levels, etc.
